div.p: N.-E. Omrani, F. Ogawa, H. Nakamura and N. Keenlyside initiated the study, F. Ogawa and N.-E. Omrani designed the experiments. N.-E. Omrani performed the model-experiments and did the most of the analyses. F. Ogawa. and S. Lubis helped in the analyses. N.-E. Omrani wrote the paper and all coauthors, including K. Matthes, contributed to the discussion of the results and the improvement of the written text.
